pages.text: $(li)I was blown away when I first saw this video! $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rR8W-f9YhYA)This is Create$(/l)$(li)$(l:https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLaURolsKD_VHKO5qJ47kc7EpxU0MvcFp1)Create Mod S2 $(/l) playlist by $(l:https://www.youtube.com/c/ZedaphPlays)ZedaphPlays$(/l)$(li)Create: Trains Made Simple! $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V-TsTy5VgkI)Part 1$(/l) and $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5eBk98Q3RJU)Part 2$(/l) by $(l:https://www.youtube.com/@MischiefofMice)Mischief of Mice$(/l)

pages.title: TangoTek's Create
pages.text: $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MfRqNr8v3-E&list=PL8t707flkqpdNXkkGwmZQZnENSLf862p8)TangoTek's Create Mod S2$(/l) series is lots of fun and very informative. Some of the things he does will not be server friendly, but if done in moderation should be fine - he does everything BIG!$(br)1. $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MfRqNr8v3-E&list=PL8t707flkqpdNXkkGwmZQZnENSLf862p8&index=1&pp=iAQB)Let's CREATE!$(/l)$(br)2. $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rXgODZmSdwk&list=PL8t707flkqpdNXkkGwmZQZnENSLf862p8&index=2)Ultimate Steam Engine!$(/l)$(br)3. $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SaPZ3PwLBhQ&list=PL8t707flkqpdNXkkGwmZQZnENSLf862p8&index=3)We Killed the Dragon with VEGETABLES!$(/l)$(br)4. $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MYp4_-p6Y_0&list=PL8t707flkqpdNXkkGwmZQZnENSLf862p8&index=4)The Factory is UP!$(/l)$(br)5. $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=soqcMW8knTY&list=PL8t707flkqpdNXkkGwmZQZnENSLf862p8&index=5)Ultimate Cobble Generator and Smart Factory!$(/l) This factory can be messy. Be sure

to seal so cobble and water do not go everywhere. I hope to make a video to show changes I have made to improve upon this design.$(br)6. $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qw3zJnF44Vg&list=PL8t707flkqpdNXkkGwmZQZnENSLf862p8&index=6)The Mob Blender! $(/l)$(br)7. $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Oo0wI6HQYQY&list=PL8t707flkqpdNXkkGwmZQZnENSLf862p8&index=7)Ultimate World Eater with 845 Drills!$(/l) Be careful! 25 drills (5x5) max reccomended size.$(br)8. $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t5Igo0IP8fw&list=PL8t707flkqpdNXkkGwmZQZnENSLf862p8&index=8)The Trains are Delivering! $(/l)$(br)9. $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8EIaagNm7I&list=PL8t707flkqpdNXkkGwmZQZnENSLf862p8&index=9)Rotating Storage Room Modules! $(/l)$(br)10. $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aqY7IG69uaE&list=PL8t707flkqpdNXkkGwmZQZnENSLf862p8&index=10)Tier 2 of the Factory is ALIVE!$(/l)$(br)11. $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IxSySD_-IoM&list=PL8t707flkqpdNXkkGwmZQZnENSLf862p8&index=11)Blazin' with BDubs!$(/l) Not needed on Potato, but fun to watch and learn!

The following have wonderful YouTube videos featuring Create. Their videos are very informative and to the point and don't waste a lot of time. Their examples are easy to follow. I highly recommend.$(br2)$(l)IMPORTANT$() Many of the videos are for older versions of Create, so be sure to only watch the videos showing the correct version! You want v0.5 or newer.$(li)$(l:https://www.youtube.com/c/rockit14)Rockit14$(/l)$(li)$(l:https://www.youtube.com/c/polartt)Polartt$(/l)
